item.description: Custom Provider Bavarder support (almost) every models available on Hugging Chat if they support Text To Image. Choose a model by searching on Hugging Face Go on the model page and click on the copy icon next to the model name Paste the name in the preferences > Custom Provider > Model Apply and enjoy!

Hugging Face A token is not necessary, it allow you to have a bigger rate limit Create an account on HuggingFace Follow the documentation for getting an user access token Use the generated token in the API key entry
OpenAI The OpenAI API uses API keys for authentication. Visit your API Keys page to retrieve the API key you’ll use in your requests.
